section.title: Hot Plugging a Virtual Disk
section.para: You can hot plug virtual machine disks. Hot plugging means enabling or disabling devices while a virtual machine is running.

note.para: The guest operating system must support hot plugging virtual disks.

step.para: Click the Virtual Machines tab and select a virtual machine.
Click the Disks tab in the details pane and select the virtual disk to hot plug.
Click Activate to enable the disk, or click Deactivate to disable the disk.
